      • toHtmlString

        public static java.lang.String toHtmlString(java.awt.Color color)
        Converts a color to a HTML color in the format #RRGGBB.

      • fromString

        public static java.awt.Color fromString(java.lang.String s)
        Returns a color from a string. If the string could not be decoded, null is returned. This methods supports the html color format (i.e. #RRGGBB) and some predefined names (e.g. red, green, etc.).

      • blend

        public static java.awt.Color blend(double factor,
                                   java.awt.Color color1,
                                   java.awt.Color color2)
        Blend together two colors, using the specified factor to indicate the weight given to the first color.
